text.name: ca_enable_roller_crimping_long
text.text: If enabled, rolling over cover crops will crimp them in order to stop their growth and produce a soil cover

text.name: ca_enable_roller_mulch_bonus_long
text.text: If enabled, roller crimping cover crops will grant a mulching bonus

text.name: ca_enable_seeder_mulch_bonus_long
text.text: If enabled, direct seeding into cover crops will grant a mulching bonus

text.name: ca_fertilization_behavior_base_game_long
text.text: Sets the fertilization strategy when roller crimping, mulching or direct seeding into cover crops.

text.name: ca_fertilization_behavior_pf_long
text.text: Sets the fertilization strategy when roller crimping, mulching or direct seeding into cover crops with the Precision Farming DLC active.

text.name: ca_enable_weed_suppression_long
text.text: If enabled, weeds will not grow after direct seeding into cover crops or seeding into roller crimped/mulched cover crops.

text.name: ca_allow_direct_seeder_field_creation_long
text.text: If enabled, direct seeders may be used for field creation. Field creation can be toggled for each seeder separately by using the 'Toggle pipe' keybind (default: 'o')

text.name: ca_enable_grass_dropping_long
text.text: If enabled, roller crimping and mulching will drop grass on the ground in order to simulate the presence of biomatter. The grass will be automatically removed when seeding.

text.name: ca_enable_straw_chopping_bonus_long
text.text: If enabled, chopping straw (instead of swathing it) will fertilize the field. Precision Farming does this already, but the amount will be adjustable.

text.name: ca_enable_cultivator_bonus_long
text.text: If enabled, cultivating cover crops will have the same effects as roller crimping. Precision Farming does this already, but the amount will be adjustable.

text.name: ca_nitrogen_amount_roller_crimping_long
text.text: Defines the kg/ha of nitrogen you get when roller crimping or mulching cover crops.

text.name: ca_nitrogen_amount_direct_seeding_long
text.text: Defines the kg/ha of nitrogen you get when direct seeding into cover crops.

text.name: ca_nitrogen_amount_straw_chopping_long
text.text: Defines the kg/ha of nitrogen you get when chopping straw with a harvester (instead of swathing it).

text.name: ca_nitrogen_amount_cultivating_long
text.text: Defines the kg/ha of nitrogen you get when incorporating cover crops into the soil with a cultivator.
